website_summaries.verdict: A sleek tote filled with wine-inspired extras.
pros: Ability to convert from a picnic-ready tote to one that can carry two bottles of wine
Comes with two glasses, napkins, and corkscrew
cons: Chill wine ahead of time for optimal use

customer_reviews.title: ... after returning from vacation and wishing we had something like this. This is great
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my wife after returning from vacation and wishing we had something like this. This is great!! The two acrylic wine 'glasses' are adequate and the wine opener is sturdy enough and works. The carrier is lightly insulated so chilled wine stays somewhat chilled for a while. I would suggest carrying a different bottle stopper as the one provided would work and look nice if the bottle is left upright, but does not fit snuggly enough to prevent leakage if you do not consume all of the wine and the bottle is tipped on it's side.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: ... have had one of these for years and just love it! It actually fits two bottles if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for years and just love it! It actually fits two bottles if you remove the glasses on the right side. Perfect for picnics and travel. I travel frequently for work and this fits perfectly into a weekend-sized bag and keeps the bottle(s) protected. I recently visited my sister for the weekend and when she saw mine she wanted one. I purchased this one as a gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little case for anytime
customer_reviews.text: Great case to take on a light hike or to take to the park. The glasses are durable and work great for their purpose. The included cork screw is a little rough but does the job. If you use another corkscrew it might not fit perfect in the pocket. The little picket for the corkscrew would be better designed but is ok. Overall a great case and I recommend it to everyone that would like a good travel wine case. You could also use it for a nice big beer.
customer_reviews.author: DCoy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful product! Great complement to my new picnic basket. This order was processed quickly and receipt of the order was within a few days of the initial order. I highly recommend this vendor. Great for future gift-giving for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Silverman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I keep my travel insulated travel wine cups in this and my insulated travel coffee cups, So I’m ready to go at a moment’s notice. Great bag & I love the adjustable strap too
customer_reviews.author: Missoni Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift, and I want one for myself now. This is very well made, just the right size, and great all around. T he only thing I didn't like is the glasses are plastic, but that's an easy fix to go get my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Care for a drink?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this picnic pack as a gift for a friend of mine that just moved across the street from the beach in San Diego. I have another Picnic at Ascot item that I have been impressed with and wanted to send him something enjoyable for his new home. When he received it, he was very excited. He really enjoys it and has used it often. He says it's compact and easy to carry and he appreciates that it's not a pink/purple/pastel color! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wine Holder
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wine holder for us. It holds one bottle of wine if you use the wine plastic wine glasses. We don't, so we can fit 2 bottles of wine, one red for him and a white for me. Sturdy, fun and reasonably priced. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Houle

customer_reviews.title: Casual taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for carrying a bottle when dining with friends. I like olive color, total design is casual and natural. But the plastic cups inside look cheap, I may replace rhem with my own glasses to-go.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is as nice as advertised, and all the pieces inside are durable and aesthetically pleasing. Gave as a gift in a gift exchange, and it was the highlight of the evening. Extremely efficient design, and since including a bottle of upscale ginger ale rather than alcohol, made obvious the versatility of the gift for the nondrinker as well.
customer_reviews.author: balhui

customer_reviews.title: Wine Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Product is lightweight and contains everything you need to enjoy wine when you reach your destination. It is well organized and easy to carry. The quality of the product was better than I expected for the price I paid. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys their wine.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann C. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for one bottle on the go. Material is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but the cups aren't at the same quality.
customer_reviews.text: The bag construction was great, but the cups are very cheap in quality. It doesn't appear to have much insulation to keep the wine cold on a long trip, but it should work well if you're not traveling too far from home.
customer_reviews.author: shryx86

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with napkins. Product description literally says "with napkins"
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Picnic in the park
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a "thank you" gift after friends saw the case that I had. This is a handy way to carry wine whether on a picnic, going to a B.Y.O.B. gathering. This case contains everything one needs to enjoy their bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and is going to make a great gift. A good price and came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Wine Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a trip along the PCH from Santa Barbara to SanFrancisco. This device worked great, it protected the wine bottle and provided two very sturdy acrylic glasses. I didn't think I would like the glasses but they proved their worthiness when dropped and did not break like glass would have. Overall the best unit for the price. I researched many and am glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Larsman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Paid $30 dollars for this to find out it has cheap plastic glasses that is very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: ryan mcconkey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Thoughtfully made. Nice fabric napkins. Works just as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it would accept some different glasses, but it would not. Will make do with one supplied.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haig

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift. I was very pleased to present it and the receiver liked it too.
customer_reviews.author: Chrishna

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE FOR THOSE GET AWAYS A THE BEACH OR PARK
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE FOR THOSE GET AWAYS A THE BEACH OR PARK. YOU SHOULD SEE PEOPLE LOOK AT YOU WHEN YOU OPEN IT UP!!
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA GUNTHER

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy taking a bottle of wine to a local wildlife viewing area in the evening. This carrier is perfect for the two of us. I couldn't find one in our area (northern VA)- even at local wine shops.
customer_reviews.author: Air Force spouse

customer_reviews.title: Good product, handy for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Handy for travel. Bottle stays secure. Everything you need when not at home.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzmaam

customer_reviews.title: great wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: it is a great piece to take your wine bottle on a trip or outing on the boat, everything you need is in the carrier. really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: It looks compact and will definitely be appreciated by the ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks compact and will definitely be appreciated by the person I will give it to.
customer_reviews.author: B.Mensonides

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any wine drinker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my sister-in-law. She loved it. I would purchase again. It came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Eder

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed.Not as described. Napkins were missing, but because it was ordered for a gift I did't have time return it and order another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like Wine
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Works great and looks nice also.
customer_reviews.author: Toneruser

customer_reviews.title: A very nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: The item looks exactly the same as in the picture. It keeps drink cold surprisingly well and is very easy to carry around with you. It is perfect for that romantic couple who wants to spend the evening watching a sunset and drinking wine on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: Good, but Glasses are Plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wine and glass set. However, the two glasses are clear acrylic or polycarbonate and not "glass." I did not see anything the listing or advertisement of product features that stated the glasses were plastic.
customer_reviews.author: MDMc8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Wish the glasses were glass and not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Walter Swancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product- bought for a bridal shower gift along with a bottle of wine. Looks even better in person :)
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: works well but...
customer_reviews.text: it works well for carrying a bottle of wine, even better with an ice pack tucked inside. The cups are cheap plastic ones but I swopped them for some stemless glasses I had.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sansone

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas gift for my dad who was heading to Florida for the winter. It was such a great gift, 2 glasses, napkins, bottle opener, and I included his favorite wine....... if you're looking for a gift for someone who has everything, this is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Beth, Boston MA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Strong material and enough capacity for one bottle of wine and glasses. Easy to carry and walk to beach or your picnic. Keeps bottles cold
customer_reviews.author: Helena Dabrowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift for a couple who are friends of my husband... THEY LOVED IT!!! Only thing is I changed them to glass wine glasses... but love the quality and design!!!!
customer_reviews.author: debbi

customer_reviews.title: SMART LOOKING WINE COOLER/CARRIER
customer_reviews.text: Chardonnay was still cold after a couple of hours before opening. Wine glasses are acrylic and seem sturdy enough. This carrier makes a nice presentation for whatever outing.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product!!! It was exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer winget

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: The person I gave it to loved it! It is good quality and very functional...it's nice that you can carry glasses or two bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: My picnic life will never be the same
customer_reviews.text: I felt like i found a great product with a good amount of lucks to stumble upon this and final delivery proved it so. the color is more bright than it looks on monitor and grab on hands feels like a bit harsh but none irritating Accompanying complimentaries have a good quality and glasses are considerate plastic-made. Overall, great product by the standards of both functioning and positioning.
customer_reviews.author: Deck Trout

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: The person I bought it for says he gives it 3 stars. He uses it twice a month and its starting to wear a little. He was expecting a bit more quality when he put it on his wish list.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The was a nice purchase although I thought the wine glasses were "glass" they are plastic. We like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I attend a lot of BYOB's..this case is perfect/awesome!! I am ordering another one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This wine carrier is just the right size, everything included is well made. Fabric is well made strap is of right length
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Mooney,sr.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly fits our needs.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has monthly Bunco get togethers at our neighborhood clubhouse. Everyone likes a taste of wine while playing. This tote fits her needs perfectly for transporting what she needs to drink the wine as well as the wine itself. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift and was so disappointed when I opened the package and found one wine glass cracked and the napkins missing. I had to return the item and come up with another idea for the birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality item
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking in real life, Looks better in photos then in person. Sent it back because it was disappointing quality
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: cheap product
customer_reviews.text: First time we used the product the corkscrew broke off in the cork. What a joke. Nearly ruined our evening except for the fact that a friend was wearing a leatherman and was able to remove the remnants of the corkscrew and open it with his far superior product
customer_reviews.author: Joel Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for someone else or yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Gave one as a gift and ended up having to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Roth

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fabulous friend who loves to drink and go to outdoor concerts and plays. I can definitely say this gift was just as fabulous as her. Now I want one, but I have to figure out a way to justify it. Maybe next summer I can. :)
customer_reviews.author: TobyMommy5

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! The goblets are durable and the insulation of ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! The goblets are durable and the insulation of the carrier is great. I had a bottle of red wine in the carrier for nearly 6 hours outside at a Summer event in the sun and it was still cool when we opened it up.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because of the low price and decided to take a chance due to the price. I've taken it out a couple of times and it has done the job for me. The case is a pretty sturdy construction, and it's compact enough to put in my backpack. For the price, it's a good value and worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: stealthlantern

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Nice tote for carrying a bottle and the necessary accessories. Glasses included are cheap plastic, but the cae is tall enough to fit 2 Libby glass wine glasses, with a cloth napkin in between to prevent breakage. No a high class looking case like the $80+versions, but tis does the job. Well made
customer_reviews.author: gymbok

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item! Perfect size and very well made. The plastic glasses are just the right size and sturdy enough to last - at least for a few uses! The carrying strap is adjustable and also sturdy. Zipper works easily, never got stuck (which was a problem I'd had with other similar carriers). Perfect for a picnic or a day on the boat (as long as you're not driving!). Plus, I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: TravelProf

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This wine case is well constructed, as are its contents. It is more rustic looking than you may think from the picture. Think in terms of burlap, but it is still decent to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carrying case and glasses
customer_reviews.text: Amazing carrying case and glasses. I took this on a romantic weekend getaway and an old estate in Upstate New York and made for an amazing moment.
customer_reviews.author: AOL

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect the glasses to be make of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the glasses to be make of plastic but that's probably my own fault for not reading enough in to it. I ended up giving this to my sister and law for christmas so I would've have to deal with sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Burns

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. For hotel stays
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. For hotel stays, I leave the wine glasses home & add a second bottle of wine. The divider prevents breakage.
customer_reviews.author: SandyN

customer_reviews.title: The corkscrew is not the best of its kind
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and handy. Sturdily built. Holds two bottles if you want. The corkscrew is not the best of its kind, but OK.
customer_reviews.author: Joaneee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping, Travel, Picnics, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Really handy and sturdy item. Perfect for picnics, weekends, travel. Very convenient. I bought one for myself and 2 others as gifts. The recipients are as happy with the item as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Let the wine pour.
customer_reviews.text: This wine carrier is sturdy, attractive and easy to carry and store. we have taken it to parties in our clubhouse and it is like having our own wine bar, complete with unbreakable glasses, opener, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Di Bella

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for new picnicers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister after suggesting her and the hubby should picnic at the Walker Art Center sculpture gardens in Minneapolis and discovering they had no cork screw during a visit. The newlyweds were using his swiss army knife! I loved that it was compact and insulated for whites and more importantly she cannot wait to use it! I would give it 5 stars if it had glass glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite handy for carrying one or two bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Hamptons Collection Wine Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wine carrier as a gift for my daughter to use at BYOB restaurants. I hesitated to purchase something that I couldn't see or hold, but she is absolutely enjoying it. Whenever she visits me, (she lives out of town) she brings it and always has something nice to say about it and what a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hornyak

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional wine tote gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift for a newly engaged couple. They loved it! The bag itself is a simple, well made, and compact wine tote.
customer_reviews.author: V S T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Bought for wine enthusiast friend and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: We took it to the beaches and it was easy to carry on our scooter
customer_reviews.text: Packed this in our suitcase to take to Italy. We took it to the beaches and it was easy to carry on our scooter!
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Vuz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Shipped quickly; well packaged. Not sure what else to say other than it came exactly as described. My wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for a friend since I loved mine so much
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Loved but sad
customer_reviews.text: They LOVED IT but their apartment burned down within a week of getting. Never got to use it. They lost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Tkirk

customer_reviews.title: just what expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. I bought if for my mom, and she really likes it. A second bottle definitely fits
customer_reviews.author: Michele

product_meta.title: Picnic at Ascot Insulated Wine Tote with 2 Wine Glasses, Napkins and Corkscrew -Designed & Assembled in the USA
product_meta.description: Color:Black with Gingham NapkinsTop quality deluxe wine holder with glasses featuring state of the art Thermal Shield insulation to maintain wine at the perfect temperature. Glass compartment can be used to hold a second bottle. Contains two glasses, napkins and combination corkscrew. Adjustable shoulder strap. This stylish gift will always impress. Rugged 600D canvas construction. Designed and assembled in the USA. Lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRANTY from PICNIC at ASCOT USA - Designers and Manufacturers for over 25 years of a Wide Range of High Quality Picnic Baskets, Coolers, Wine Carriers & Life Style Products
ASSEMBLED IN THE USA TOP QUALITY deluxe insulated wine tote to keep wine or champagne at the perfect temperature.
INCLUDES 2 acrylic wine glasses - napkins - combination corkscrew
CONVERTIBLE - carry two bottles of wine by removing the two acrylic wine glasses.
A GREAT GIFT IDEA - Surprise Your Friends and Family - Great for Housewarming, Engagement, Wedding, Anniversary, Retirement, Birthday, Christmas, Holiday, or Hostess Gift!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
